attributes.action: Investigate the misinformation provided by campaigns about the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Quote from EU expert Professor Michael Dougan in a lecture regarding the EU "the leave campaign has degenerated in to dishonesty really on an industrial scale" (https://news.liverpool.ac.uk/2016/06/22/transcript-professor-michael-dougan-eu-referendum/)

David Cameron: Major Leave campaign points are lies. (http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-eu-referendum-36570766)
attributes.background: The both campaigns have provided misinformation in the EU referendum run up. These "facts" are the basis upon which many normal people voted in the referendum. Lying on such a scale should be illegal, as it is blatant and manipulative propaganda. Those responsible must be held accountable.
